stockmarket.model

Class StockImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarket.model.StockImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stock

    public class StockImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Stock
    This class is an implementation of Stock interface and defines all the methods mandated by this interface.

        Parameters:
        companyTicker - ticker symbol of the company of which stock is to be constructed
        amount - amount of the stock in dollars
        purchaseDate - purchase date of the stock
